channel.title: Please help and respond!

item.title: Please help and respond!
item.dc:creator: @Johnny2 Johnny2
item.description:
@Johnny2 wrote:

I have a problem with blocking Dragon Claws from my server example it you were to type ::item 3101 1 nuthing would happen. Here is were i want the code so please take a lookâ€¦

                                                                           [u]Normal[/u]

              if (cmd[0].equals("item")) {
        int itemID = Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]);
        int itemAmount = Integer.parseInt(cmd[2]);
        if (p.wildernessZone(p.absX, p.absY)) {
           p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You cannot spawn items while inside of the wilderness.");
           return;
        }



                                                                       [u]Wanted Result[/u] 

                                                        
              if (cmd[0].equals("item")) {
        int itemID = Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]);
        int itemAmount = Integer.parseInt(cmd[2]);
        if (p.Engine.playerItems.equals("3101")) {
           return;
        if (p.wildernessZone(p.absX, p.absY)) {
           p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You cannot spawn items while inside of the wilderness.");
           return;
        }

What am i doing rong?

Read full topic
